title: currencies endpoint not updated for HoT

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Ah, the HoT currencies are currently blacklisted. I’ll try to get those out sometime this week or next week.

comments.author: MuhQ.8012
comments.body:
Hey guys,

i have an app running recording statistics about my wallet and how I gather currencies. With the launch of HoT the endpoint https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/account/wallet returns the new currencies correctly as they are gathered by the account.
The second endpoint to make use of this data, https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/currencies doesn’t contain the new ids so we can’t cross-reference it.

Is this a bug or is there a new endpoint I am not aware of?
